name: Uniformity of application and construction
text:
ARTICLE 9.  MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS
 
Note
 
  Article heading reenacted by L 2015, c 77, pt of §1.
 
     §576B-901  Uniformity of application and construction.  In applying and construing this uniform act, consideration shall be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it. [L 1997, c 295, pt of §1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of §1]
